# cook your code here
import string
for _ in range(input()):
    alpha = []
    alpha = list(string.ascii_lowercase)
    alpha += list(string.ascii_uppercase)
    jewel = raw_input()
    count = {}
    for i in alpha:
        count[i] = jewel.count(i)
    total = 0
    for i in count:
        if count[i] > 1:
           total += count[i] / 2 + count[i] % 2
        if count[i] == 1:
            total += 1 
    print total
